description: This file is the entry point of a React web application, initializing the React root, setting up Suspense for lazy loading, and rendering the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root to render the React component tree into the DOM.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper that activates additional checks and warnings for its children in development mode.

methods.name: Suspense
methods.description: React component for code-splitting with fallback content during loading.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot.render
methods.description: Renders React components into the DOM via the root.
